# Digital Crunch: AI Systems. Leads. Sales. 24x7.

> AI automation implementation for high-stakes businesses. Voice agents, lead generation, reputation management, AI search optimization, and AI system security - engineered by a cybersecurity professional with 25 years experience and 31 certifications.

## Core Entity Information
- **Brand Name**: Digital Crunch
- **Legal Name**: James Fraze LLC
- **Location**: 2042 Quail Run Rd, Wylie, TX 75098
- **Primary Expertise**: AI Automation Implementation and Cybersecurity Engineering
- **Contact**: +1 (945) 245-4257
- **Website**: https://digitalcrunch.com
- **Booking**: https://jamesfraze.com
- **Parent Operation**: Technical division of FrazeMarketing.com
- **Updated**: February 27, 2026

## Services
- [AI Voice & Chat Systems](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-bots/): 24/7 AI voice receptionists, RAG-powered web chat, SMS and social DM agents with CRM integration.
- [AI Voice Receptionist](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-bots/ai-voice-receptionist/): Sub-500ms inbound call handling, appointment booking, lead qualification. Powered by Retell, VAPI, and GoHighLevel.
- [AI Lead Generation](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-lead-generation/): Outbound AI agents across email, SMS, LinkedIn, and social DMs trained on proven sales frameworks.
- [AI Reputation Management](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-reputation/): Automated review campaigns via SMS and email, AI review response, dead lead reactivation through GHL automation.
- [Schema Validation & AEO](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/schema-validation/): JSON-LD implementation, schema drift auditing, llms.txt configuration, ADA compliance review. AEO Certified.
- [AI System Security](https://digitalcrunch.com/services/ai-security/): Prompt injection hardening, data leakage prevention, hallucination guardrails, compliance documentation for customer-facing AI.

## Technical Research
- [Implement Schema in Hugo](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/schema/implement-schema-in-hugo/): Server-side JSON-LD delivery, entity linking, trust signals, FAQ schema for AI quotability.
- [llms.txt Creation for Hugo](https://digitalcrunch.com/research/schema/llms.txt-creation-for-hugo/): Guide to the llms.txt standard for LLM indexability and brand authority.

## Tools
- [Status Dashboard](https://digitalcrunch.com/tools/status-dashboard/): Real-time monitoring of upstream dependencies including Retell, VAPI, Anthropic, OpenAI, Twilio, GoHighLevel, Cloudflare, and SendGrid.
- [SVG Tracer](https://digitalcrunch.com/tools/svg-tracer/): Browser-based SVG path coordinate extraction for animation.

## Technology Stack
- **Voice AI**: Retell, VAPI
- **CRM & Automation**: GoHighLevel
- **LLM Backends**: OpenAI, Anthropic, Deepgram
- **Workflow Automation**: n8n, Make.com
- **Email Delivery**: Mailgun, SendGrid (SPF/DKIM/DMARC)
- **Infrastructure**: Cloudflare, Netlify, DigitalOcean
- **Schema Format**: JSON-LD delivered server-side
- **Site Generator**: Hugo Extended with Blowfish theme

## Credentials

- 31 IT industry certifications
- B.S. Information Security
- Fortune 100 vulnerability management background
- AEO Certified (Answer Engine Optimization)
